title: TOXIC-ZY
author: TOXIC-ZY
content: I also want without bounty.  But how to leave from where to talk to whom to bring the bounty project.  I don't know anything about it.  But I spoke to some popular bounty managers.  They said they didn't need any more people there.  But if someone gives me a project, then I will work honestly, inshallah.  Please arrange a project.

comments.author: TOXIC-ZY
comments.body: Quote from: bitkanu on October 16, 2022, 10:53:06 PMDo it by yourself rather than begging here. make a proposal or something that will give you benefit. If you're begging here will not solve your problem. They can handle it by themselves. If you have zero experience and don't even project developers will be looked at you. You need to have at least some skill.  I am very good at work.  And how do you call it begging?  If a person is a little older, the eyes are higher on the forehead than people.  You are an example of that.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: TOXIC-ZY on October 16, 2022, 10:07:53 PMI also want without bounty.  But how to leave from where to talk to whom to bring the bounty project.  I don't know anything about it.  But I spoke to some popular bounty managers.  They said they didn't need any more people there.  But if someone gives me a project, then I will work honestly, inshallah.  Please arrange a project.Do you want to join a project? Find for those projects in the Announcements or Tokens section and you'll those projects that might need someone onboard.It's like finding a new job and for you, it's that you'll try to find new projects that will allow you to be part of them so, it's on you how enthusiastic you are finding that project you want to join.There are a bunch of them and will just take you time for you to find one.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: Quote from: TOXIC-ZY on October 17, 2022, 04:43:29 AMI am very good at work.  And how do you call it begging?  Read this for multiple times, are you really don't think this is not begging? it doesn't matter which words you use and how you're trying to say but the point is still I want to workQuote from: TOXIC-ZY on October 16, 2022, 10:07:53 PMBut if someone gives me a project, then I will work honestly, inshallah.  Please arrange a project.QuoteIf a person is a little older, the eyes are higher on the forehead than people.  You are an example of that.This is another reason why many projects doesn't want to cooperate with you, instead of taking a criticism as a professional, but you're taking it as personal @OP if you want to become a bounty hunter, I advise you to avoid it and start to learn about cryptocurrency from the basic thing. Join a bounties doesn't increase your knowledge, actually it would make you become a dumb person since you're start become like a robot.

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: Quote from: TOXIC-ZY on October 16, 2022, 10:07:53 PMI also want without bounty.  But how to leave from where to talk to whom to bring the bounty project.  I don't know anything about it.  But I spoke to some popular bounty managers.  They said they didn't need any more people there.  But if someone gives me a project, then I will work honestly, inshallah.  Please arrange a project. I believe your command over English is not that good, which is fine but I would suggest you to improve on it, because that would help you in the long run while on this forum. You can continue to post in Bangladesh section but work on your English too.Firstly you are new user in this forum. Dont you think it looks bad to older forum members here when a newly created account comes here only to start looking for money making methods. You are expected to learn, read and ask about crypto and bitcoin in general to gain knowledge and gradually start providing services which includes campaigns.My suggestion would be to work on your English and side by side, learn about crypto from the internet and this forum as much as you can, try to participate in discussions going on and gradually work on your rank. If you manage to earn enough merits to rank up, you can attempt the bitcoin paying signature campaigns, which is the gold standard for campaign on this forum, way better than any bounty.No one will hand you a project, you have to build your name and reputation and then go for one.

comments.author: TOXIC-ZY
comments.body: Thank you all very much.  To express your beautiful opinion.  All the bounties we do from this forum.  No manager pays except a few trusted managers.  It turns out that it takes us four to five weeks to make a bounty.  Then it is seen that we are not getting paid after doing the work.  The forum has corrupt and thieving managers.  They make them work with ordinary people.  Then they don't get paid.  Take any action against them.  You will see that the forum has become popular.  Today there are new users.  They will also pay attention to the work of the forum.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Quote from: TOXIC-ZY on October 17, 2022, 05:03:50 PMThe forum has corrupt and thieving managers.  They make them work with ordinary people.  Then they don't get paid.  Take any action against them.  You will see that the forum has become popular.  Today there are new users.  They will also pay attention to the work of the forum.If you have an accusation against them, you're free to file a scam accusation and provide the evidence for saying that they're like that.It's known that there are those type of managers but, I'm also looking at the good and responsible managers. So, if that concerns you, don't get involved in a project and bounty that don't have a reputable person to back what they're running.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: TOXIC-ZY on October 16, 2022, 10:07:53 PMI also want without bounty.  But how to leave from where to talk to whom to bring the bounty project.  I don't know anything about it.  But I spoke to some popular bounty managers.  They said they didn't need any more people there.  But if someone gives me a project, then I will work honestly, inshallah.  Please arrange a project.It seems you are just here to find something to work om and gain money. I do hope not all coming here are just after the privilege to join some bounty and earn from it. This is my initial plan when I joined here but there are other ways to earn and not just here on forum. Its unfortunate that mostly just joined here for that purpose, and instead of contributing and learning here some important knowledge about bitcoin and crypto, this is their goal to earn money. Maybe its not too late to change your perspective regarding forum.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: What i will tell you is that go to the service section write down your services, your past experience and what you could renders to the public at then people will look at your thread and choose you or even contacts you to work with them than just begging here, there are also some good bounty's that pays in BUSD in the bounty sections which i think you could join and create article for them and be accepted instead of just walking around here seeking for whom will be considerate to you. Better still think of how to build yourself here, focus on constructive posts to keep you growing then maybe after getting to a higher rank you may decide to apply in signature campaign at the service section.
